languages.text: "Я не ищу ничего для себя. Я исполняю долг. Что же касается масштаба... Знаете, что обеспечивает неукротимость каждого члена Инквизиции? Понимание, что он несет персональную ответственность за жизни квадриллионов подданных Императора, живущих на миллионе планет. Персональную, понимаете? Думаете, после такого меня можно напугать масштабом предстоящего дела?"

"I am not in this for my own sake. I am doing my duty. And as for the scale... Do you know what ensures the indomitability of every member of the Inquisition? The knowledge that they are personally responsible for the survival of the Imperium, and that the fate of billions hinges on their actions. Do you understand? Personally responsible. Compared to that scale, do you think I am daunted by the gravity of this mission?"
languages.original_text: "Я не ищу ничего для себя. Я исполняю долг. Что же касается масштаба... Знаете, что обеспечивает неукротимость каждого члена Инквизиции? Понимание, что он несет персональную ответственность за жизни квадриллионов подданных Императора, живущих на миллионе планет. Персональную, понимаете? Думаете, после такого меня можно напугать масштабом предстоящего дела?"

traits.locale_text: "I'm not in this for my own sake. I'm fulfilling my duty. And the scale... Do you know what ensures the indomitableness of each member of the Inquisition? The understanding that they are personally responsible for quadrillions of Emperor's subjects' lives living on a million of planets. Do you understand? Personal. Do you think the scale of the upcoming mission's scale is going to frighten me?"

"I'm not in this for my own sake. I'm fulfilling my duty. And the scale... Do you know what ensures the indomitableness of each member of the Inquisition? The understanding that they are personally responsible for quadrillions of Emperor's subjects' lives living on a million of planets. Do you understand? Personal. Do you think the scale of the upcoming mission's scale is going to frighten me?"

"I'm not in it for my own sake. I'm fulfilling my duty. And as for the scale... Do you know what ensures the indomitability of each member of the Inquisition? The realisation that they are personally responsible for quadrillions of Emperor's subjects' lives living on a million planets. Do you understand? Personally responsible. Do you think the scale of the upcoming mission's scale is going to frighten me?"

"I'm not in it for my own sake. I'm fulfilling my duty. And as for the scale... Do you know what ensures the indomitability of each member of the Inquisition? The realisation that they are personally responsible for quadrillions of Emperor's subjects' lives living on a million planets. Do you understand? Personally responsible. Do you think the scale of the upcoming mission's scale is going to frighten me?"

"I am not in this for my own sake. I am doing my duty. And as for the scale... Do you know what ensures the indomitability of every member of the Inquisition? The knowledge that they are personally responsible for the lives of quadrillions of the Emperor's subjects on a million planets. Do you understand? Personally responsible. Compared to that scale, do you think I am daunted by the gravity of this mission?"

"I am not in this for my own sake. I am doing my duty. And as for the scale... Do you know what ensures the indomitability of every member of the Inquisition? The knowledge that they are personally responsible for the survival of the Imperium, and that the fate of billions hinges on their actions. Do you understand? Personally responsible. Compared to that scale, do you think I am daunted by the gravity of this mission?"

languages.text: « Je n'agis pas dans mon propre intérêt. J'accomplis mon devoir. Quant à mon ambition... Savez-vous ce qui garantit la ténacité de tout membre de l'Inquisition ? Le fait de savoir qu'il est personnellement responsable de la survie de l'Imperium et que le sort de milliards d'individus dépend de ses actes. Comprenez-vous ? Personnellement responsable. Comparée à cela, croyez-vous que l'ampleur de cette mission me fait peur ? »
languages.original_text: "I am not in this for my own sake. I am doing my duty. And as for the scale... Do you know what ensures the indomitability of every member of the Inquisition? The knowledge that they are personally responsible for the survival of the Imperium, and that the fate of billions hinges on their actions. Do you understand? Personally responsible. Compared to that scale, do you think I am daunted by the gravity of this mission?"

traits.locale_text: « Je n'agis pas dans mon propre intérêt. J'accomplis mon devoir. Quant à mon ambition... Savez-vous ce qui garantit la ténacité de tout membre de l'Inquisition ? Le fait de savoir qu'il est personnellement responsable de la vie de quadrillions de sujets de l'Empereur sur un million de planètes. Comprenez-vous ? Personnellement responsable. Comparée à cela, croyez-vous que l'ampleur de la mission qui m'attend va me faire peur ? »

languages.text: «No estoy haciendo esto para beneficiarme; estoy cumpliendo con mi deber. En cuanto a la escala... ¿Sabe qué es lo que asegura la fortaleza de espíritu de todos los miembros de la Inquisición? La certeza de que son responsables directos de la supervivencia del Imperium y de que el destino de billones depende de sus actos. ¿Lo entiende? Responsables directos. Comparado con eso, ¿usted se cree que me intimidan las probabilidades de esta misión?».
languages.original_text: "I am not in this for my own sake. I am doing my duty. And as for the scale... Do you know what ensures the indomitability of every member of the Inquisition? The knowledge that they are personally responsible for the survival of the Imperium, and that the fate of billions hinges on their actions. Do you understand? Personally responsible. Compared to that scale, do you think I am daunted by the gravity of this mission?"

traits.locale_text: «No hago esto por beneficio personal; estoy cumpliendo con mi deber. En cuanto a la escala... ¿Sabe qué es lo que asegura la determinación de los miembros de la Inquisición? El hecho de que son responsables directos de las vidas de cuatrillones de súbditos del Emperador a lo largo de un millón de planetas. ¿Lo entiende? Responsables directos. ¿Cree que la escala de esta misión va a asustarme?».

languages.text: “我这么做并不是为了我自己，我是在履行我的职责。至于我的野心是否膨胀……你知道吗？为什么我们审判庭的成员，每个人都如此不屈不挠？因为我们每个人都明白：我们要为帝国负责，亿万臣民的命运都在我们手上。你明白吗？他们的安全是我们的个人责任。你觉得，与如此沉重的责任相比，我会对我的计划犹豫不决吗？”
languages.original_text: "I am not in this for my own sake. I am doing my duty. And as for the scale... Do you know what ensures the indomitability of every member of the Inquisition? The knowledge that they are personally responsible for the survival of the Imperium, and that the fate of billions hinges on their actions. Do you understand? Personally responsible. Compared to that scale, do you think I am daunted by the gravity of this mission?"

traits.locale_text: “我这么做并不是为了我自己，我是在履行我的职责。至于我的野心是否膨胀……你知道吗？为什么我们审判庭的成员，每个人都如此不屈不挠？因为我们每个人都明白，我们要为一百万颗行星上，几千亿臣民的生命负责。你明白吗？他们的安全都是我们的个人责任。你真的以为，即将到来的大场面会吓得倒我吗？”

languages.text: "Ich mache das nicht für mich selbst. Ich erfülle meine Pflicht. Und was das Ausmaß angeht ... Wisst Ihr, was die Unbezwingbarkeit jedes einzelnen Mitglieds der Inquisition gewährleistet? Die Erkenntnis, dass sie persönlich verantwortlich sind für das Überleben des Imperiums, und dass das Schicksal von Quadrillionen von ihnen abhängt. Versteht Ihr? Persönlich verantwortlich. Glaubt Ihr, angesichts dieser Dimensionen macht mir das Ausmaß dieser Mission Angst?"
languages.original_text: "I am not in this for my own sake. I am doing my duty. And as for the scale... Do you know what ensures the indomitability of every member of the Inquisition? The knowledge that they are personally responsible for the survival of the Imperium, and that the fate of billions hinges on their actions. Do you understand? Personally responsible. Compared to that scale, do you think I am daunted by the gravity of this mission?"

traits.locale_text: "Ich mache das nicht für mich selbst. Ich erfülle meine Pflicht. Und was das Ausmaß angeht ... Wisst Ihr, was die Unbezwingbarkeit jedes einzelnen Mitglieds der Inquisition gewährleistet? Die Erkenntnis, dass sie persönlich verantwortlich sind für das Leben von Quadrillionen der Untertanen des Imperators auf Millionen von Planeten. Versteht Ihr? Persönlich verantwortlich. Glaubt Ihr, das Ausmaß der kommenden Mission macht mir Angst?"

languages.text: 「私は自分自身のために行動しているのではない。責務を果たすために行動しているのだ。規模については…異端審問庁の人員の不屈の精神を保っているものが何であるかを知っているか？帝国の存亡、強いては百万の惑星に住む何兆もの皇帝臣民の命をその肩に負っているという自覚だ。わかるか？個人的な責任だ。それと比較して、私が今度のミッションの重要性に窮していると思うか？」
languages.original_text: "I am not in this for my own sake. I am doing my duty. And as for the scale... Do you know what ensures the indomitability of every member of the Inquisition? The knowledge that they are personally responsible for the survival of the Imperium, and that the fate of billions hinges on their actions. Do you understand? Personally responsible. Compared to that scale, do you think I am daunted by the gravity of this mission?"

traits.locale_text: 「私は自分自身のために行動しているのではない。責務を果たすために行動しているのだ。規模については…異端審問庁の人員の不屈の精神を保っているものが何であるかを知っているか？帝国の存亡、強いては百万の惑星に住む何兆もの皇帝臣民の命をその肩に負っているという自覚だ。わかるか？個人的な責任だ。それと比較して、私が今度のミッションの重要性に窮していると思うか？」

languages.text: "Bunu kendim için yapmıyorum. Sadece görevimi yerine getiriyorum. Seviyeden bahsedeceksek... Engizisyon'un her bir mensubunun boyun eğmezliğini destekleyenin ne olduğunu biliyor musun? İmparatorluk'un ayakta kalması için kişisel olarak sorumlu tutulmamız ve milyonlarca kişinin kaderinin eylemlerimize bağlı olmasıdır. Anlıyor musun? Kişisel olarak sorumluyuz. Seviye olarak bakınca sence bu görevin büyüklüğünden korkuyor olabilir miyim?"
languages.original_text: "I am not in this for my own sake. I am doing my duty. And as for the scale... Do you know what ensures the indomitability of every member of the Inquisition? The knowledge that they are personally responsible for the survival of the Imperium, and that the fate of billions hinges on their actions. Do you understand? Personally responsible. Compared to that scale, do you think I am daunted by the gravity of this mission?"
